document_data.name: Mintiir
document_data.patron deity: [[Achazar]]{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|33}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Mintiir''' was a famed jeweler and member of a cell of the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] that operated out of [[Imdolphyn]] in [[1480 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Mintiir was the husband of the popular [[genasi]] singer [[Tiilra Nonintarr]].
document_data.History: In 1480 DR, Mintiir was a member of a cell of the Cult of Reborn Flame operating out of Imdolphyn. He allowed his wife to be taken by members of the cult, to be used as a sacrifice to awaken the [[primordial]] [[Achazar]]. Mintiir was eventually killed by a group of [[adventurer]]s and other powerful individuals from the [[Windrise Ports]] that wanted to destroy the cult for good.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|40-48}}
